title: String Extractor from Character Array
name: LGF_ExtractStringFromCharArray
description:
## Short description ##

The function extracts a String specified by a text before and after from an array

input.name: textBefore
input.description: Text in front of the characters which has to be extracted

input.name: textAfter
input.description: Text behind the characters which has to be extracted

in/out.name: searchIn
in/out.description: Array of Character or Byte to search in
